text: 5.8 Sng 141.2, Lep 4.8-10, 8.3-4, 15.2 Dak tek, tap kɨm mɨdep omɨŋal omɨŋal anɨb okok sek, 24 bɨawl okok sek, ap kɨli Chag Sipsip Ñɨluk yek sɨŋak kɨgom yɨmɨlak. Bɨawl anɨb okok kɨli tap gita tek okok keke dɨl, kɨnag gol dɨl gɨlak okok keke dɨ yelak. Kɨnag dɨ yelak mɨgan anɨb okok, tap kuy tep owep ak dagɨlel sɨkom kuy tep aplan jakɨl yek. Tap kuy tep owep God nop dagɨlɨlak anɨb ak, binɨb God yɨl yelak okok agnɨgep kɨli tek ak.
